query:
SELECT
                pack_banners.id,
                start_date,
                end_date,
                COALESCE(
                    JSONB_AGG(
                        JSONB_BUILD_OBJECT(
                            'card_type_id',
                            card_type_id,
                            'frequency',
                            frequency
                        )
                    )
                    FILTER
                    (WHERE pack_banner_cards IS NOT NULL),
                    '[]'::jsonb
                ) AS "distribution: sqlx::types::Json<Vec<PackBannerCard>>"
            FROM pack_banners
            LEFT JOIN
                pack_banner_cards
                ON pack_banner_cards.pack_banner_id = pack_banners.id
            WHERE id = $1
            GROUP BY id
